SEARCH

Class Character

java.lang.Object
Character
public class Character extends Object
The Character class implements a class that represents characters in the OfficeCombat1.java game This class contains each character's information states as well as methods that are used to determine the winner of the game
Since:
2024-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Palden Tamang

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(String name, int energyLevel, int skillLevel)
      This constructor is used to construct a new Character with the given name, energyLevel and skillLevel
      Parameters:
      name - This is the name of the character
      energyLevel - This is the energy level of the character
      skillLevel - This is the skill level of the character

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      This getter method gets the character name of the character by returning the character's name.
      Returns:
      String The name of the character is returned

    • getSkillLevel

      public int getSkillLevel()
      This getter method gets the skill level of the character by returning the character's skill level.
      Returns:
      int The skill level of the character is returned.

    • getEnergyLevel

      public int getEnergyLevel()
      This getter method gets the energy level of the character by returning the character's energy level.
      Returns:
      int The energy level of the character is returned.

    • hurt

      public int hurt(int attackAmount)
      This method is used to reduce the character's energy level by the specified attack amount dealt by the other character
      Parameters:
      attackAmount - Indicates how much damage is dealt on the character
      Returns:
      int attackAmount is returned to indicate how much damage, i.e hurt is inflicted on the character.

    • attack

      public int attack(Weapon w1)
      This method calculates the total damage dealt by the character using the specified weapon.
      Parameters:
      w1 - The weapon that is used to attack.
      Returns:
      int This returns the total damage dealt by the character.

    • isLose

      public boolean isLose()
      This method is used to check if the character has lost all energy.
      Returns:
      boolean This returns true if character's current energy level is less than or equal to 0, this means the character has lost the fighting event. false is returned otherwise which means the character still has not lost the fighting event.
